title: Wait, I got chat banned for what?
body:
Hold on, Riot. Be real with me. If someone calls you the N-word for no real reason, then is it ok? No? Didn't think so...
Then why is it okay for the support to call me the N-word at the last possible second in champ select before the game loads? FURTHER MORE, why is it okay for me to get chat banned and for that game to be used as the second "offense" of toxicity? Especially when the bot lane and top lane trio worked together to make my game a living hell and all decided to "report me on false report accusations". I mean honestly, since I knew from the beginning that they were all going to make threats of reporting me, I kept the whole game squeaky clean. I wasn't in anyway toxic, yet I received a 25 GAME chat ban for that? For being called the N-Word? That's honestly unacceptable IMO. 
I would post the game logs but I don't see them or anyway to bring them back from when they popped up. This is kinda unbelievable Riot. I shake my head at how inefficient and corruptible/easily abused your report system is. I'm outraged because it makes climbing ranked solo queue that much harder with limited communication.

replies.body:
What about game 1? You only have game 2 and 3 here.

In game 2 you used hate speech. Lucky you didn't get instant 14-day. 

And in game 3, instead of just playing, you had to, through out the entire game, berate blitzcrank. I understand he insulted you, but silently report him yourself, and don't make others do so too. First, each player should only report what they want, not what someone tells them to. Secondly multiple reports don't stack, so even if more people had reported him it wouldn't have made a difference.
Hate speech, where?

> UnknowRival: im not a %%%got

No matter the context,  it's still hate speech.
There is no context, that isn't a word. So I mean, RIP

You said something that's filtered here, more than likely the actual word.

Seriously, stop acting like League is a high school locker room.

No, not filtered. Nothing on the forums is filtered, but anything can be taken down. There is no language filters here.

League is a competitive game, nothing more. I don't think this is in anyway comparable to a high school locker room.

As is said below, %%% signs are used to block out hate speech and racism on the boards (the n-word, the f-word, etc).

Based on your in game comms as evidenced by your chat logs you posted, you seem to think communication in League should resemble the immature, useless, and offensive chat that happens in a high school locker room.
Sure sure. I guess you can relate since you're so aware of what comprises a high school locker room.
I don't know if you're trolling or if you legitimately think people haven't been to high school.
You're talking immaturity, but in my high school experience everything was orderly. Even the football locker room. So I'm unaware of the stereotypes of your locker rooms.
Racist terms and hate speech is filtered as %'s on the board.
Very mature. Im done responding.
You were no help to begin with so your importance is indifferent to me
don't spam the boards.
New one to make things less messy, the other is deleted.
kk
You can't really ask for reports at all.
You got chat banned for being a generally despicable person through chat. Your next ban is going to be a 14day suspension, and you obviously now don't qualify for any End of Season rewards.
Bet, the honor system is very corrupt and can be exploited easily. Not hard to make a party and get honored.
Constant negativity and begging for report.

Not really begging. Just kindly asking. The enemy team was very considerate to me as well. I don't understand why people are so nit picky and are more or less hypocrites. Rather appalling to me. People pick out every single thing and act like it's the worst thing in the world. There is a report algorithm you know. I don't believe that it has the ability to see everything that you see. It only makes sense to evaluate and look for the blatant red flags. Having people review every report is inefficient and a waste of man power. 

Even though you say "Constant negativity" I congratulated my Nocturne on a good gank. I said thank you. I asked for people to report him once. That's much less than begging, simply asking politely.
